titleStmt.title: An electronic transcription of Cairo Genizah Fragment Cambridge University TS F6.3
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies
Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

availability.p: This work is copyright Hayim Lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 License.

notesStmt.note:
Prose description. Use the following as model
Fragment in the Cambridge University Libraries, Taylor-Schechter Collection. Covers Bava Qamma 3:5 - 11; 9:5 - 10:8.
Transcription from online images of the manuscript, available at http://jnul.huji.ac.il/dl/talmud/mishna/selmimnu.asp and at https://fgp.genizah.org. FGP nos. C99171-C99172
The leaf 1vL - 1rR is has fewer lines and shorter text than 1rL -1vR
TRANSCRIBED BY: Shlomo Strauss
EDITED BY: Hayim Lapin

handNote.note: Pointing is in a different ink than the main manuscript. Possibly a second hand.

ab.label: י׳
י׳א׳
ab.w:
בת
Deleted element dotted for erasure.

ab.label: י׳ב׳
ab.w:
ל
Correction possibly by primary hand.שור

ה
A mark that may represent צ in a second hand is visible above damaged area. Perhaps correcting the original scribe.ן

ab.label: י׳ז׳
ab.w:
אחר
Insertion point is within the gap.
